contest-event.event-date:
May 15, 1999 D Ebbw Vale Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-third-section
Test Piece Contest
Owain Glyndwr
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Bst instrumentalist - euphonium Tredegar Youth. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 7 bands competed.
May 3, 2009, 6:36 p.m. June 30, 2020, 10:03 p.m.
1 Tredegar Youth Band Tudor Williams
2 Cwmbran Band John Burns
3 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ceri Lewis
4 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Colin Hogg
5 Vale of Glamorgan Band Ivor Barnett
6 Glynneath Silver Band Mike Faro
7 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
